srengine

Class SREObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • srengine.SREObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Entity

    public abstract class SREObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents all object with angle and position.
    Author:
    Vojtech 'Rain' Vladyka, Jaroslav 'Sit' Schmidt
